thread.title: Rakesh Bhakta
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Rakesh Bhakta

author: Rakesh Bhakta
title: Rakesh Bhakta
text:
Molly Stevens, from Costa Rican Vacations, provided an excellent and very well organized vacation for my family. So much though and consideration was put into planning my vacation from my family's personal preferences to finding the right excursions to match with the age of my kids.
We actually went back to Molly to plan a trip for a group of ladies and again, the vacation was very well planned.
